components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Delivery Failures To and From AT&T Network in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays and delivery failures when sending messages to and from AT&T network in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AT&T network in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incidents.name: IOT Network Issues in Africa Due to Fiber-Cut

incident_updates.body: Due to issues with multiple underwater cables that handle connectivity to Africa, connectivity for cellular IoT products, Super SIM and Programmable Wireless, in the region may be severely impacted up to being completely down. Impact and recovery time across networks and countries may vary significantly. Repairs to the cable could take considerable time and service may not return to normal until complete. We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa
INTERNET OF THINGS - Programmable Wireless
INTERNET OF THINGS - Super SIM

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 March 2024 at 22:00 PDT until 18 March 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from AT&T United States handsets via short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 March 2024 at 14:30 PDT until 18 March 2024 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 March 2024 at 09:00 PDT until 21 March 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 March 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 21 March 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.
